1.title: The Harris Way
1.plot: Bill and the Harris clan make arrangements for the passing of Mrs. Elnora, including a peach-colored theme, and a plan for Bill's oldest son, William, to direct the funeral services. And Bill and his sons shoot a commercial showcasing "stepping".

2.title: Going to the Chapel
2.plot: William proposes to his girlfriend; Tiara updates her online-dating profile.

3.title: A Funeral Home Divided
3.plot: The family take a road trip to Kansas; Bill and Tiara get into a fight.

4.title: Gone to Glory
4.plot: The Harris family handles a military funeral for the Clayton family. Anxiety is high as the Harris men prepare yet another "stepping" service, attended by one of the largest crowds they've seen at a funeral - and Tiara is not there to help.

5.title: Here Come Tiara
5.plot: Bill buys new limos for the funeral home, and is impressed with the results. William worries that the rift between Bill and Tiara will affect his upcoming wedding to Wendy. And Bill and Tiara have a heart-to-heart in an effort to clear the air.

6.title: Solemn Vow
6.plot: Bill is overcome with grief after the passing of his Uncle Ben. Bill's sons step in to support him through the arrangements. The family celebrates their gratitude at being together as son William, and his fiancée, Wendy, finally tie the knot!

imdb.plot outline: When an entire family works each and every day around death, how does it affect the way they live their lives? How does in affect the way in which they view the world? At the William C. Harris Funeral Home in St. Louis, MO, helping people grieve, enabling people to celebrate, encouraging people to rejoice in the life of their recently deceased loved ones is an art, a science and a calling. Funeral Boss is a workplace documentary series centered around a compassionate but crazy family that hosts and services a steady flow of unique characters under crisis and in celebration. We will see first hand what it takes to run a thriving funeral home which also happens to be a multi-generational family business. Viewers will be inspired by the stories that center around the clients and will be entertained by the issues that arise amongst the family members within their day-to-day jobs.
